request description fluke park laboratory recently underwent its biennial nvlap accreditation audit

specifically the auditor noted that our accredited tcal calibration certificates do not contain the units of measurement for the uncertainty columns
this applies to page of all certificates and to page of a select few certificates

please make the following edits the following product certificates require c the degree celsius symbol in the header of every uncertainty column on page triclamp models including the model field metrology wells including the beamex models field metrology wells including the model the following product certificates require c the degree celsius symbol in the header of every uncertainty column on page they also require the omega symbol in the header of every uncertainty column on page metrology well calibrators including the beamex models sample certificates can be provided on request
